movie-description: Catherine Morland is a young woman who enjoys reading Gothic Novels. She is invited to Bath by a family friend, Mrs. Allen, and there she meets Henry Tilney and his sister Eleanor. Upon returning to her home with her family, Eleanor invites Catherine to come along as her guest and companion. There Catherine's imagination continues to flourish and she begins to suspect a dark secret at Northanger Abbey.
movie-short-description: Directed by Giles Foster.  With Katharine Schlesinger, Peter Firth, Robert Hardy, Googie Withers. Catherine Morland is a young woman who enjoys reading Gothic Novels.
